summary: A special agent has for 8 years been deep undercover in Asia's lucrative organized crime trade as he plays protégé to one of the key players, Banker. Now, Nick has but he has started to feel loyalty to his new environment and to the money.
cast: Andy Lau|Daniel Wu|Louis Koo|Jingchu Zhang|Anita Yuen|Nirut Sirichanya|Mei-tian He|Kai Chi Liu|Cheong Cheung|Tung-Shing Yee|Tak-Cheung Tang|Bo Yuen|Tsz Tung Tsei|Christina Tang|Kylie Wong|Ga-Leung Chan|Ka Sing Chau|Hoffman Cheng|Kwok-Wai Cheung|Sun Go|Eric Tin Cheung Li|Albert Kai-kwong Mak|Gobi Ng|Yuk-Kwai To|Wai Yin Tse|Terence Tsui|Wai-Fai Wong|Man-Kei Yiu|Yuwu Qi
title: Protégé
